response.overview: A couple will seek out peace and solitude after the loss of their baby. They will search for a new life in the wilderness of Maine. While exploring a remote property, the wife will be taken by a vicious beast. The husband will have to search the dark wilderness for his wife, or her remains. Will he rescue his wife, or will they both be killed by the wild beast. Are you willing to die for love?
response.title: White Fangs
